cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.current_location: about 105 miles ESE of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest across Hispaniola and the Bahamas, then toward the southeast Florida coast and up the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the southeast Florida coast (around Broward-Palm Beach counties)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch for the Northwestern Bahamas (Andros Island, New Providence, Eleuthera, Abacos, Berry Islands, Grand Bahama, Bimini)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning for Puerto Rico, U.S./British Virgin Islands, Dominican Republic, Haiti north coast, Turks & Caicos, Southeastern and Central Bahamas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeast Florida coastline from Miami to Cape Canaveral likely to experience tropical-storm conditions
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (sustained 39-57 mph, gusts 60 mph) possible Saturday night into early Sunday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Coastal water rise of 2–4 ft above ground level possible along barrier islands and intracoastal waterways at high tide
weather_observation.rainfall: Rain bands could produce 2–4 inches with isolated higher totals over southeast Florida
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents impacting port approaches and pilot boarding areas
